title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Understanding the Impact of Remote and Blended Learning in Technical Education (TE)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the advantages and disadvantages of remote and blended learning in technical education.
Learners can design and propose alternatives for practice-based assignments in limited-technology environments.
Learners can develop technical education scenarios using a blended learning design framework.
Learners can suggest effective operational strategies for remote learning through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
